refnamediv.refpurpose: Phase-locked vocoder processing with onset detection/processing, 'tempo-scaling'.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: mp3scal implements phase-locked vocoder processing from mp3-format disk files, resampling if necessary.
This opcode allows for time and frequency-independent scaling. Time is advanced internally. The quality of the effect is generally improved with phase locking switched on.
mp3scal will also scale pitch, independently of frequency, using a transposition factor (k-rate).

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: asig, asig2, ktime mp3scal Sfile,ktimescal,kpitch, kamp [,iskip,ifftsize, idecim, ilock]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sfile -- source soundfile stereo mp3 files.
idecim -- decimation, defaults to 4 (meaning hopsize = fftsize/4)
iskip -- skiptime in seconds, defaults to 1.
ilock -- 0 or 1, to switch phase-locking on/off, defaults to 1.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktimescal -- timescaling ratio, < 1 stretch, > 1 contract. Non-negative numbers only.
kpitch -- grain pitch scaling (1=normal pitch, < 1 lower, > 1 higher; negative, backwards)
